data.name: Help_Q4
data.value: Can I join reading groups without a paid subscription?

data.name: Help_Q3
data.value: How do I change my password?

data.name: Help_Q2
data.value: What if I did not receive the verification email?

data.name: Help_Q1
data.value: How do I create an account on LiteraryHub?

data.name: Help_A5
data.value: You can email us at literary.hub.contact@gmail.com or via the Contact us page.

data.name: Help_A3
data.value: Go to your profile, select Account settings and click Change password.

data.name: Help_A1
data.value: Click Sign up, fill in your details and confirm your email. Done!

data.name: Help_A4
data.value: Yes, there are free groups available. With a Premium subscription you get access to exclusive groups.

data.name: Help_A2
data.value: Check your spam folder. If it's not there, from the Verification pending page you can resend the email.
